content: this legal case involves a coownership property specifically a house with a courtyard the case has gone through two instances of court starting at the municipal court rijeka and then being appealed to the county court slavonski brod the cost of the procedure was 5100 croatian kunas and it has been ongoing for 31 months the final resolution is that the coownership property will be dissolved and sold through a public auction or another suitable method the proceeds from the sale will be distributed among the coowners based on their shares the court considered the possibility of dividing the property geometrically and terminating the coownership there was a dispute over the division of a garage and the court rejected a proposal to appoint another expert ultimately the court decided that the property should be sold at a public auction and the proceeds distributed among the coowners
